description: From Latin numerātus, past participle of numerō.

verbs.description: numerate (third-person singular simple present numerates, present participle numerating, simple past and past participle numerated)

description: From Latin numerus +‎ -ate, by analogy with literate.

adjectives.description: numerate (comparative more numerate, superlative most numerate)

entries.meaning: Having the ability to understand numbers and perform arithmetic.
